text: Mstino () is a lake in Tver Oblast, Russia, in the Valdai Hills area. Its main outflow is Msta River. The lake occupies an area of , its length is , width . It lies at an altitude of 154 meters, with maximum depth of 10 meters. ==References== Maximum depth- 10 kms ??? ==See also== * Akademicheskaya Dacha, an artist base on the Mstino Lake Category:Lakes of Tver Oblast
title: Lake Mstino
